page.title: 17Royal British Legion Band
page.content: The Pencoed Royal British Legion Band has twenty five members not including our two percussion players and our conductor. We have approximately fifty Instruments. Our concert band can contain any number of players because there is no limit to its size. We also have a beginners class and are starting a Junior Band. The subscription for each member is fifty pence a week. Our rehersal premises at the moment are opposite the Kings Head Public House in Pencoed. This year the Waldsassen Band from our twin town in Germany came over and we performed a joint concert in the Welfare Hall. One of our best performances was at a concert in the Royal British Legion for Armistice night.
